task_description: Write, update, and maintain computer programs or software packages to handle specific jobs such as tracking inventory, storing or retrieving data, or controlling other equipment.
Interact with customers to provide information in response to inquiries about products and services and to handle and resolve complaints.
Conduct quantitative analyses of information involving investment programs or consideration of the purchase or sale of securities.
Develop, create, and modify general computer applications software or specialized utility programs.
Research market conditions in local, regional, or national areas, or gather information to determine potential sales of a product or service.
Develop and implement a set of techniques or analytics applications to transform raw data into meaningful information using data-oriented programming languages and visualization software.
Sell goods for wholesalers or manufacturers to businesses or groups of individuals.
Examine, analyze, and interpret accounting records to prepare financial statements, give advice, or audit and evaluate statements prepared by others.
Recruit, screen, interview, or place individuals within an organization.
Design, create, and modify websites. Analyze user needs to implement website content, graphics, performance, and capacity.
